text: (Iṇaivaikkumpaṭi ceytu vaḻikeṭuttavarkaḷil) evarkaḷ mītu nam taṇṭaṉai vitikkappaṭṭu viṭṭatō avarkaḷ (iṟaivaṉai nōkki) ‘‘eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! Nāṅkaḷ vaḻi keṭuttavarkaḷ ivarkaḷtāṉ. (Eṉiṉum, evaruṭaiya nirppantamumiṉṟi) evvāṟu nāṅkaḷ vaḻi keṭṭōmō avvāṟē ivarkaḷaiyum (evvita nirppantamumiṉṟiyē) vaḻi keṭuttōm. Ātalāl, uṉṉiṭam (avarkaḷuṭaiya poṟuppiliruntu) nāṅkaḷ vilakik koḷkiṟōm. Avarkaḷ eṅkaḷai vaṇaṅkik koṇṭirukkavum illai'' eṉṟu kūṟuvārkaḷ
